main event: Two lights were observed crossing in front of the observer's car at low altitude in Hortense, Georgia on February 5, 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 6 minutes,The lights were described as light yellow or white and circular or slightly oval in shape,The object disappeared to the southeast without making any sound, The witness thought it could possibly be a balloon according to the report, A letter from a commanding officer suggested the sighting could have been a small glider or large model airplane.
sighted object: two light lights in the sky
witness description: The observer was driving when he noticed the lights crossing in front of his car.
